sentence.text: In this mini-review, we update the current knowledge for the functional roles of negative regulation of Wnt signaling pathway under physiological and pathological settings, and provide new insights regarding pS14-WWOX in T leukemia cell maturation, and switching the anticancer pY33-WWOX to pS14-WWOX for cancer promotion and disease progression.

entity.text: negative regulation of Wnt signaling pathway

sentence.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II statement negative regulation of Wnt signaling pathway was originally designated as a tumor suppressor.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
negative regulation of Wnt signaling pathway

sentence.text: However, human newborns deficient in negative regulation of Wnt signaling pathway do not spontaneously develop tumors.

entity.text: negative regulation of Wnt signaling pathway

sentence.text: Suppression of pS14-negative regulation of Wnt signaling pathway by Zfra reduces cancer growth and mitigates Alzheimer*s disease progression, suggesting that pS14-WWOX facilitates disease progression.

entity.text: negative regulation of Wnt signaling pathway
